heroSection.title: Thai food on wheels
heroSection.subtitle: Authentic Thai flavors, served fresh in Romania

items.name: Pad Thai
items.description: Classic Thai stir-fried rice noodles with homemade Pad Thai sauce, egg and tofu. Finished with roasted peanuts, bean sprouts, spring onion and fresh lime. (500g)

items.name: Pad See Ew
items.description: Wide rice noodles stir-fried in rich soy & oyster sauce with egg, carrots, broccoli and spring onion. Slightly smoky, savory and comforting. (480g)

items.name: Wok Noodles
items.description: Fresh egg noodles wok-tossed in soy & oyster sauce with egg and vegetables. Savory, aromatic, and satisfying. (480g)

items.name: Green Curry
items.description: Creamy coconut milk curry with green chilies, lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves and basil, cooked with fresh vegetables. Bold and aromatic. Served with steamed jasmine rice. (500g + 250g)

items.name: Massaman Curry
items.description: Rich and mild curry made with coconut milk, massaman paste, potatoes and onions, topped with roasted peanuts. Served with steamed jasmine rice. (500g + 250g)

items.name: Tom Yum Soup
items.description: Classic Thai hot-and-sour soup with lemongrass, galangal and kaffir lime leaves, balanced with coconut milk and mushrooms. Bright and bold. Served with steamed jasmine rice. (500g + 250g)

items.name: Tom Kha Soup
items.description: Creamy coconut soup scented with galangal and lemongrass, finished with fresh lime and mushrooms. Gentle, fragrant and comforting. Served with steamed jasmine rice. (500g + 250g)

items.name: Pad Kra Pao (Thai Basil Stir-Fry)
items.description: Wok-fried with garlic, chilies and fragrant Thai basil. Slightly spicy, aromatic and deeply satisfying. Served with steamed jasmine rice. (450g)

items.name: Thai Stir-Fried Cashew Nuts
items.description: Crispy chicken stir-fried with roasted cashew nuts, onions, spring onions and bell peppers in a lightly sweet-savory sauce. Served with steamed jasmine rice. (480g)

items.name: Thai Stir-Fried Garlic Pepper Beef
items.description: Tender beef wok-fried with garlic, ground pepper and fresh vegetables in savory oyster sauce, topped with crispy onions. Served with steamed jasmine rice. (480g)

items.name: Thai Stir-Fried Rice
items.description: Jasmine rice stir-fried with egg, vegetables, garlic, soy sauce and oyster sauce. Simple, savory and comforting. (450g)

items.name: Coming soon
items.description: New appetizers will be added soon. Stay tuned!

footer-title: ThaiMe Food Truck – Authentic Thai food, served fresh in Romania.

aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.headline:
Thai street food,
now in Romania
aboutus.paragraph1: We are a husband and wife brought together by love, culture, and a shared passion for great food. I am Thai, my husband is Romanian, and together we bring authentic Thai street food from Bangkok to Romania.
aboutus.paragraph2: I grew up in a family that has been selling Thai food for over 30 years, learning traditional recipes and cooking techniques from a young age. Every dish we serve is full of flavor, care, and stories from our family kitchen.
aboutus.paragraph3: Today, we proudly serve authentic Thai recipes through our food truck in Romania. Our food is not just a meal, it's a connection between Thai and Romanian cultures, sharing warmth and traditions from our family to yours.
aboutus.thankYou: Thank you for being part of our journey ❤️
aboutus.tagline: Authentic recipes, family-made, served with love.
aboutus.socialDesc: Stay updated with our latest news and promotions.

orderPage.title: Order Now
orderPage.subtitle: Choose your preferred way to order delicious Thai food
orderPage.socialDesc: Follow our social media to see upcoming events and special offers
